title: FactCheck: is South Africa the most unequal society in the world? (University of Cape Town) ...
text: ( Source : University of Cape Town ) FactCheck: is South Africa the most unequal society in the world? 2 October 2015 It is often said that South Africa is the most unequal society in the world. Andile Makholwa, Business and Economy Editor at
